confirmation.confirmAction: Are you sure you want to proceed?

tableAssignmentModal.title: Assign to Table
tableAssignmentModal.noRoomsAvailable: No rooms available. Create rooms in Admin Panel first.
tableAssignmentModal.selectRoomToViewTables: Select a room to view tables

tableLayoutEditor.selectRoomToViewLayout: Select a room to view its layout
tableLayoutEditor.createRoomFirst: Create a room first if none exist
tableLayoutEditor.tipViewMode: Switch to Edit or Drag mode to reposition tables
tableLayoutEditor.tipEditMode: Drag tables to new positions - changes save automatically

enhancedGridLayout.title: Enhanced Grid Layout
enhancedGridLayout.dragDropInfo: Drag and drop items to rearrange them on the grid
enhancedGridLayout.keyboardInfo: Use arrow keys to move selected items

help.gridLayoutDescription: Drag and drop items to arrange them on the grid. Use toolbar buttons to manage your layout.
help.undoDescription: Revert the last action performed on the grid layout. Use Ctrl+Z to undo.
help.redoDescription: Reapply the last undone action. Use Ctrl+Y or Ctrl+Shift+Z to redo.
help.zoomDescription: Current zoom level of the grid. Click to reset to 100%. Use Ctrl+Plus/Minus to adjust.
help.clearGridDescription: Remove all items from the grid. This action cannot be undone.
help.dragDropDescription: Drag products from the panel to the grid or move existing items by dragging them.
help.keyboardNavDescription: Select an item and use arrow keys to move it. Hold Shift for larger movements.

gridControls.title: Grid Controls
gridControls.description: Adjust the grid layout settings like columns, size, spacing, and snapping behavior to customize your product grid.
gridControls.columnsDescription: Number of columns in the grid. More columns allow for wider grids but smaller items.
gridControls.gridUnitSizeDescription: Size of each grid cell in pixels. Larger cells mean bigger items but fewer items visible at once.
gridControls.gutterDescription: Spacing between grid items in pixels. Increase for more breathing room between items.
gridControls.paddingDescription: Space around the edges of the grid container. Adjust to control the margin around the grid.
gridControls.snapToGridDescription: When enabled, items will snap to the nearest grid position when moved.
gridControls.showGridLinesDescription: Toggle visibility of grid lines to help with alignment and positioning.

restaurantStandard.name: Restaurant Standard
restaurantStandard.description: Common restaurant layout with food categories organized by sections

retailStandard.name: Retail Standard
retailStandard.description: Basic retail layout with common product categories

barStandard.name: Bar Standard
barStandard.description: Bar layout with drinks organized by type

cafeStandard.name: Cafe Standard
cafeStandard.description: Cafe layout with coffee and pastries

gridControls.title: Grid Controls
gridControls.description: Adjust the grid layout settings like columns, size, spacing, and snapping behavior to customize your product grid.

dragAndDrop.title: Drag & Drop Items
dragAndDrop.description: Drag products from the left panel onto the grid canvas to add them. Drag existing items to reposition them on the grid.

layoutManagement.title: Layout Management
layoutManagement.description: Save, load, and manage different grid layouts for different purposes. Set a default layout for new sessions.

templates.title: Layout Templates
templates.description: Apply pre-made templates to quickly set up common grid arrangements like kitchen, bar, or retail layouts.

undoRedo.title: Undo/Redo Actions
undoRedo.description: Use Ctrl+Z to undo and Ctrl+Y or Ctrl+Shift+Z to redo your layout changes.

zoom.title: Zoom Controls
zoom.description: Adjust the zoom level to get a better view of your grid layout. Use Ctrl+Plus/Minus to zoom in/out.

keyboardNav.title: Keyboard Navigation
keyboardNav.description: Select an item and use arrow keys to move it precisely. Hold Shift for larger movements.

welcome.title: Welcome to Grid Customization
welcome.description: This guide will help you understand how to customize your product grid layout.

availableProducts.title: Available Products Panel
availableProducts.description: Drag products from this panel onto the grid canvas to add them to your layout.

gridCanvas.title: Grid Layout Canvas
gridCanvas.description: This is where you arrange your products. Drag items to reposition them.

gridControls.title: Grid Controls
gridControls.description: Adjust grid settings like columns, size, and spacing to fit your needs.

layoutManagement.title: Layout Management
layoutManagement.description: Save, load, and manage different grid layouts for different purposes.

keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.description: Use Ctrl+Z to undo, Ctrl+Y to redo, and arrow keys to fine-tune item positions.

availableProductsPanel.title: Available Products
availableProductsPanel.helpDescription: Drag products from this panel onto the grid canvas to add them to your layout.
availableProductsPanel.productsListAriaLabel: List of available products to add to the grid

enhancedGridCanvas.productAriaLabel: Product {{name}}, price {{price}}, position {{x}}, {{y}}, {{width}} by {{height}} grid units
enhancedGridCanvas.dragProductsHere: Drag products here to arrange them on the grid

orderActivityHistory.title: Order Activity History
orderActivityHistory.description: A log of items removed from orders and cleared orders before payment.
orderActivityHistory.noActivity: No order activity has been logged.

tableErrorBoundary.title: Tables System Error
tableErrorBoundary.description: Something went wrong with the tables system.

errorPage.title: An Error Occurred

tillSetupScreen.subtitle: Select which Till this device will operate as.
